Texts.Eng:
Amphibious born in challenging environment, having high resistance of toxic and extraordinary regeneration. In water and jungle is where they have advantage, but heat will scare them away.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Omnivore

^orange;Attributes^reset;:
  Max Health +^green;5^reset;%, Defence -^red;10^reset;%
  ^green;Resist^reset;: +^green;35^reset;% Poison, +^green;15^reset;% Cosmic & Radioactive, -^red;30^reset;% Fire
  +^green;Breathe under normal/poison water^reset; with defence and speed boost
  ^green;0.5^reset;% Health Regen
  Immune: Poison, Slow

^orange;Environment^reset;:
  Jungle, Thick Jungle, Ocean and Toxic biomes: +^green;10^reset;% Damage , +^green;10^reset;% Speed
  Hot biomes: -^red;10^reset;% Max Health , -^red;5^reset;% Defence

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Spear Mastery: +^green;20^reset;%
  Bow Mastery: +^green;20^reset;%
  Harpoons: +^green;10^reset;% Damage, +^green;5^reset;% Crit Chance, +^green;25^reset;% Energy Regen
Texts.Chs:
安抚比欧斯出生于充满挑战的环境中，具有高度的抗毒性和非凡的再生能力。在水和丛林中，它们有优势，但高温会吓跑它们。

^orange;饮食^reset;：杂食性

 ^orange;属性^reset;：
最大生命值+^green;5 ^reset;%，防御-^red;10 ^reset;%
 ^green;抗性^reset;：+^green;35 ^reset;%毒抗，+^green;15 ^reset;%宇宙射线和辐射抗性，-^red;30 ^reset;%Fire
+^green;在正常/毒液下呼吸^reset;带有防御和速度助推器
 ^green;0.5 ^reset;%生命再生
免疫：毒液，减速

^orange;环境^reset;：
丛林、茂密的丛林、海洋和有毒生物群落：+^green;10 ^reset;%伤害，+^green;10 ^reset;%速度
炎热生物群落：-^red;10 ^reset;%最大生命值，-^red;5 ^reset;%防御

^orange;武器^reset;：
矛精通：+^green;20 ^reset;%
弓技：+^green;20 ^reset;%
鱼叉：+^green;10 ^reset;%伤害，+^green;5 ^reset;%暴击率，+^green;25 ^reset;%能量再生
